page.title: 12Games We Play
page.content: At playtimes, one of our favourite games is 'Blockey Off'.One person counts to 50 while all the others hide.If they reach the post before they are seen by the counter,they get to hide again. If they are seen it is their turn to count.The counter calls 1,2,3'Blockey Off You 'when you are seen. We also play 'tick a nick' which is a chasing game.We have several bases in our playground you have got to run from one base to the other without being ticked by the person who is on. If you are ticked you join the ticker until everyone is caught. Sometimes we play charades.When it is wet we can play draughts and chess in the classroom at playtimes.We play lots of games in our games lessons. These include netball,shinty,football, touch rugby and skittleball in groups of mixed boys and girls.
